column2:
"I know the Gardinan thing is just a rumor,
and probably a false one at that, but I
still really want to give it a shot!"

"This little cutie has done so much for
me. I really want to give back some of
the love! Please say you'll do it!"

"I've been collecting some myself, but
I don't have enough yet. Would you mind
giving me a hand?"
